skills.name: Stealth
skills.description: Move unseen and unheard, allowing you to evade enemies or set up ambushes.

skills.name: Acrobatics
skills.description: Perform agile movements, including flips, dodges, and impressive leaps.

skills.name: Hacking
skills.description: Bypass electronic security systems and manipulate digital networks.

skills.name: Intimidation
skills.description: Strike fear into your opponents, making them more likely to flee or submit.

skills.name: Persuasion
skills.description: Convince NPCs to agree with your arguments or requests.

skills.name: Medicine
skills.description: Diagnose and heal injuries using medical knowledge and supplies.

skills.name: Weapon Mastery
skills.description: Specialize in handling a specific type of weapon with greater precision and power.

skills.name: Tactical Awareness
skills.description: Analyze battlefields to predict enemy movements and react accordingly.

skills.name: Deception
skills.description: Convince others of falsehoods or hide your true intentions.

skills.name: Engineering
skills.description: Modify, repair, or construct advanced technology and weapons.

skills.name: Survival
skills.description: Navigate and endure extreme environments with minimal resources.

skills.name: Forgery
skills.description: Create convincing fake documents, IDs, or artifacts.

skills.name: Tracking
skills.description: Follow trails, detect footprints, and analyze crime scenes.

skills.name: Alchemy
skills.description: Create potions, poisons, and chemical enhancements.
